abstract: Bank of America is following other Wall Street banks in seeking to cash out of investments in China’s sprawling and state-controlled banking industry.
snippet: Bank of America is following other Wall Street banks in seeking to cash out of investments in China’s sprawling and state-controlled banking industry.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG – Bank of America is aiming to raise as much as $1.5 billion by seeking to sell its remaining stake in China Construction Bank, according to a copy of a term sheet for the sale seen by DealBook on Tuesday.

headline.main: Bank of America Seeks Up to $1.5 Billion for China Construction Bank Stake
